about_the_game:
Support the development of this and our other sexy games by buying Support Art Pack!

You will get:
  • All the sexy renders from the game in full-hd resolution
  • All the renders of the characters and poses used in the game
  • Bonus renders - never seen before
  • Good feeling of supporting a small indie studio!

How to access the files?
  • Right click on the game in Steam
  • Click Properties and Local Files tab
  • Click on Browse Local Files
  • You will see the folder called Support Art Pack and inside, you will find your reward!

Enjoy!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains images of sexually explicit content and nudity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This DLC not only supports the development but will give you all the sexy renders from the game plus some extra! Thanks a lot for your support <3
